Capability.description: This type describes a capability of a collection for a specific use case.
Capability.longDescription: This type shall describe a capability of a resource collection in terms of how a client can create resources within the collection for the specified use case.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CapabilitiesObject.description: The link to the resource the client can issue a GET request against to understand how to form a POST request for a collection.
CapabilitiesObject.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource that matches the type for a resource collection and shall contain annotations that describe the properties allowed in the POST request.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

UseCase.description: The use case in which a client can issue a POST request to the collection.
UseCase.longDescription: This property shall contain an enumerated value that describes the use case for this capability instance.

CollectionCapabilities.description: This type describes the capabilities of a collection.
CollectionCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall describe any capabilities of a resource collection in terms of how a client can create resources within the resource collection.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Capabilities.description: The list of capabilities supported by this resource.
Capabilities.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of objects that describe the capabilities of this resource collection.

MaxMembers.description: The maximum number of members allowed in this collection.
MaxMembers.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of members allowed in this resource collection.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RelatedItem.description: An array of links to resources associated with this capability.
RelatedItem.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources that are related to this capability.

TargetCollection.description: The link to the collection that this capabilities structure is describing.
TargetCollection.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection that this structure describes.  A client can use this structure to understand how to form the POST request for the collection.

enumDescriptions.ComputerSystemComposition: This capability describes a client creating a new computer system resource from a set of disaggregated hardware.
enumDescriptions.ComputerSystemConstrainedComposition: This capability describes a client creating a new computer system resource from a set of constraints.
enumDescriptions.VolumeCreation: This capability describes a client creating a new volume resource as part of an existing storage subsystem.
